SEARCH

Class ClientTest

java.lang.Object
ClientTest
class ClientTest extends Object
JUnit test class for the OthelloClient class, which represents the client-side functionality of the Othello game application, including interactions with the server.
Version:
1.0, 12/07/2023
Author:
Dinh Thuy Nhat Vy
See Also:
  • OthelloClient
  • ProtocolException
  • Protocol
  • ServerUnavailableException
  • ServerHandler

  • Method Details

    • setUpStream

      @BeforeAll public static void setUpStream()
      Sets up the output stream redirection to capture "System.out" during testing.

    • testHandleHello

      @Test void testHandleHello() throws ProtocolException
      Tests the OthelloClient.handleHello(String) method, which processes the server's greeting message.
      Throws:
      ProtocolException - if an error occurs during protocol handling.

    • testHandleLogin

      @Test void testHandleLogin()
      Tests the OthelloClient.handleLogin(String) method, which processes the server's response to a login attempt.

    • testHandleList

      @Test void testHandleList()
      Tests the OthelloClient.handleList(String) method, which processes the server's response to a list request, displaying the available players in the game lobby.

    • testHandleNewGame

      @Test void testHandleNewGame() throws ProtocolException, ServerUnavailableException
      Tests the OthelloClient.handleNewGame(String) method, which processes the server's response to starting a new game, including initializing the game board.
      Throws:
      ProtocolException - if an error occurs during protocol handling.
      ServerUnavailableException - if the server is not available during the test.

    • testHandleMove

      @Test void testHandleMove() throws ProtocolException, ServerUnavailableException
      Tests the OthelloClient.handleMove(String) method, which processes the server's response to a player's move during an ongoing game.
      Throws:
      ProtocolException - if an error occurs during protocol handling.
      ServerUnavailableException - if the server is not available during the test.

    • testHandleGameOver

      @Test void testHandleGameOver() throws ProtocolException
      Tests the OthelloClient.handleGameOver(String) method, which processes the server's response when a game is concluded, providing the outcome of the game.
      Throws:
      ProtocolException - if an error occurs during protocol handling.

    • testSendMethods

      @Test void testSendMethods() throws ServerUnavailableException
      Tests the various send methods in the OthelloClient class and the handleServerCommand method of the ServerHandler class that communicate with the server, ensuring the proper handling of server responses and correct interactions between the client and server.

      This test covers the following scenarios:

      - Sending a hello message and handling the server's response.

      - Attempting to list available players without logging in.

      - Attempting to queue for a game without logging in.

      - Logging in with a username and handling the server's response.

      - Attempting to log in again after already being logged in.

      - Sending a list request and handling the server's response.

      - Trying to push a move when not in a game and validating the response.

      - Joining and leaving the game queue and validating the responses.

      - Pushing a move while in a game and validating the response.

      - Handling server commands such as ERROR and testing the server's response.

      - Handling an unknown command from the server and checking for proper exception handling.

      - Testing the behavior when the server is unavailable.

      Throws:
      ServerUnavailableException - if there is an issue with the server connection during testing.

    • invokeServerHandlerPrivateMethod

      private void invokeServerHandlerPrivateMethod(ServerHandler serverHandler, String methodName, String argument) throws Exception
      Invokes a private method of the ServerHandler class for testing purposes.
      Parameters:
      serverHandler - the instance of the ServerHandler class.
      methodName - the name of the private method to invoke.
      argument - the argument to pass to the invoked method.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the method invocation. The exception is thrown by the invoked method.

    • restoreStream

      @AfterAll static void restoreStream()
      Restores the original "System.out" stream after all tests have been executed.
